mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, APP_PRGM_ID, APP_PRGM_LNM, APP_PRGM_PNM, APP_PRGM_DCD, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_RMK, VRF_CD, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
, APP_PRGM_LNM, APP_PRGM_PNM, APP_PRGM_DCD, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
mapper.insert: insert into WAQ_APP_PRGM (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, APP_PRGM_ID, APP_PRGM_LNM, APP_PRGM_PNM, APP_PRGM_DCD, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_RMK, VRF_CD, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{appPrgmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appPrgmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appPrgmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appPrgmDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_APP_PRGM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
insert into WAQ_APP_PRGM
RQST_NO,
RQST_SNO,
APP_PRGM_ID,
APP_PRGM_LNM,
APP_PRGM_PNM,
APP_PRGM_DCD,
RQST_DCD,
RVW_STS_CD,
RVW_CONTS,
VRF_RMK,
VRF_CD,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID,
REG_TYP_CD,
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{appPrgmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{appPrgmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{appPrgmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{appPrgmDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1, SYSDATE,
#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSDATE, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAQ_APP_PRGM
APP_PRGM_ID = #{appPrgmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_PRGM_LNM = #{appPrgmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_PRGM_PNM = #{appPrgmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_PRGM_DCD = #{appPrgmDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_APP_PRGM set APP_PRGM_ID = #{appPrgmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_PRGM_LNM = #{appPrgmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_PRGM_PNM = #{appPrgmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_PRGM_DCD = #{appPrgmDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE WAQ_APP_PRGM A SET (A.REG_TYP_CD, A.APP_PRGM_ID) = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.APP_PRGM_ID ) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END , MAX(B.APP_PRGM_ID) FROM WAM_APP_PRGM B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.APP_PRGM_PNM = A.APP_PRGM_PNM AND B.APP_PRGM_DCD = A.APP_PRGM_DCD ) , A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 요청서내 중복(AP001) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_APP_PRGM D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.APP_PRGM_PNM = D.APP_PRGM_PNM AND A.APP_PRGM_DCD = D.APP_PRGM_DCD AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)
--검증쿼리 : 논리명 중복(AP002) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_APP_PRGM D WHERE A.APP_PRGM_LNM = D.APP_PRGM_LNM AND NOT D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))
--검증쿼리 : 물리명 중복(AP003) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_APP_PRGM D WHERE A.APP_PRGM_PNM = D.APP_PRGM_PNM AND NOT D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

--검증쿼리 : 변경일 때 변경된 데이터가 없을 경우 (AP000) AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_APP_PRGM D WHERE A.APP_PRGM_PNM = D.APP_PRGM_PNM AND NVL(A.APP_PRGM_LNM,'_') = NVL(D.APP_PRGM_LNM,'_') AND NVL(A.APP_PRGM_DCD,'_') = NVL(D.APP_PRGM_DCD,'_') AND NVL(A.OBJ_DESCN, '_') = NVL(D.OBJ_DESCN, '_')
)
mapper.select:
--물리모델 테이블 요청서 리스트 조회 SELECT A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , A.APP_PRGM_ID , A.APP_PRGM_LNM , A.APP_PRGM_PNM , A.APP_PRGM_DCD , A.RQST_DCD , A.RVW_CONTS , A.VRF_RMK , A.VRF_CD , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS , A.REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM , A.RQST_USER_ID , A.APRV_DTM , A.APRV_USER_ID
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM FROM WAQ_APP_PRGM A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAQ_APP_PRGM
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = SYSDATE , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND NVL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.select: --신규 적재 대상 추출 SELECT * FROM WAQ_APP_PRGM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_APP_PRGM A SET (APP_PRGM_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.APP_PRGM_ID AS APP_PRGM_ID , NVL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_APP_PRGM B WHERE B.APP_PRGM_PNM = A.APP_PRGM_PNM ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_APP_PRGM B WHERE B.APP_PRGM_PNM = A.APP_PRGM_PNM )
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_APP_PRGM A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_APP_PRGM B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.APP_PRGM_ID = A.APP_PRGM_ID )
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_APP_PRGM A SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_APP_PRGM B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.APP_PRGM_ID = A.APP_PRGM_ID )
